description:
Metropolis of music, MIDICITY. A kitty girl wearing gothic lolita clothing named Cyan is scouted by Maple Arisugawa, the president of a music agency. From there, she meets Chuchu (a pun off of the sound that rabbits make) the honor student rabbit girl, a net geek dog girl named Retoree (from "Retriever"), and an alien sheep (?) girl named Moa. Together, they form the band named "Plasmagica," and aim for the top of the world.

However, the path there is long and tough, and keeping in high spirits is important. By battling against other strange bands, Plasmagica slowly grows toward a top-grade band. In the end, they'll be a band that becomes the driving force of MIDICITY's music industry... Maybe?

Gonna be a music millionaire!

(Source: Anime News Network)

tags.name: Band
tags.description: Main cast is a group of musicians.

tags.name: Kemonomimi
tags.description: Prominently features humanoid characters with animal ears.

tags.name: Nekomimi
tags.description: Humanoid characters with cat-like features such as cat ears and a tail.

tags.name: Ensemble Cast
tags.description: Features a large cast of characters with (almost) equal screen time and importance to the plot.

tags.name: Isekai
tags.description: Features characters being transported into an alternate world setting and having to adapt to their new surroundings.

tags.name: Shapeshifting
tags.description: Features character(s) who changes one's appearance or form.

tags.name: Cute Girls Doing Cute Things
tags.description: Centers around female characters doing cute activities, usually with little to no emphasis on drama and conflict.

tags.name: Primarily Female Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of female characters.

tags.name: CGI
tags.description: Prominently features scenes created with computer-generated imagery.

tags.name: Anthropomorphism
tags.description: Contains non-human character(s) that have attributes or characteristics of a human being.

tags.name: Cute Boys Doing Cute Things
tags.description: Centers around male characters doing cute activities, usually with little to no emphasis on drama and conflict.

tags.name: Urban
tags.description: Partly or completely set in a city.

tags.name: Rock Music
tags.description: Centers on the musical style of rock, not to be applied to anime that use rock in its soundtrack.

tags.name: Magic
tags.description: Prominently features magical elements or the use of magic.

tags.name: Idol
tags.description: Centers around the life and activities of an idol.

tags.name: Twins
tags.description: Prominently features two or more siblings that were born at one birth.

node.description:
**Date of Birth:** ?? ??, 1976
**Birthplace:** Chiba Prefecture, Japan

**Takahiro Ikezoe** is a Japanese animator, director, episode director and storyboard artist.

__Machida Touko__ is a Japanese script/screenwriter and series composer.

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/sakuribo)

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/OhishiMasaru)

Also draws hentai under the penname of YUMENO-Z.

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/Sunma47) | [Wiki (jp)](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/三間雅文)

One of the industry's most prolific sound directors, having worked on more than 300 productions.

After having graduated college, Mima joined Magic Capsule, a sound production company ran by his relative [Susumu Aketagawa](https://anilist.co/staff/120062/). In 1986, he debuted as a sound director on [MD Geist](https://anilist.co/anime/1285/MD-Geist/). He left Magic Capsule in 1996, and later joined Techno Sound. In 2004, he became the studio's representative director.

__[Website](https://www.tsubasanium.com/)__ | __[Twitter](https://twitter.com/tsubasacurry)__ 

__Tsubasa Itou__ is a Japanese composer, arranger and orchestrator.

__[Website](https://www.tsubasanium.com/)__ | __[Twitter](https://twitter.com/tsubasacurry)__ 

__Tsubasa Itou__ is a Japanese composer, arranger and orchestrator.
